Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params.amount: Amount of the bid in terms of the game token. Use {nextAmount} to know min valid value

increaseRevision(address).details: Revision should be increased on each contract upgrade

isController(address).details: Return true if given address is controller

params.minAuctionPrice: Min allowed initial price, 0 is not allowed
params.shelterId: Shelter to be sold. Assume, that message sender belongs to the guild that owns the shelter.

returns._0: id of newly crated position. You can get this ID also by using {positionBySeller}

returns.bidIndex: 0-based index of the opened bid in {positionToBidIds}
returns.positionId: ID of the position that the buyer is going to purchase

applyAuctionBid(uint256).notice: Apply winner-bid by seller or by buyer. Assume that auction ended. Transfer winner-bid-amount to the seller. Transfer shelter from seller to the buyer. CLose the position.

auctionEndTs(uint256).notice: Deadline of auction ending. The deadline is changed on each creation of new bid for the given position.

bid(uint256,uint256).notice: Buyer action. Create new bid with amount higher than the amount of previously registered bid. The amount is taken from guild bank to balance of this contract and returned if the bid is closed.

closeAuctionBid(uint256).notice: Buyer action. Allow to close NOT last bid only. Close auction bid and transfer bid-amount back to the buyer.

closePosition(uint256).notice: Seller action. Close not executed position.

controller().notice: Return controller address saved in the contract slot

fee().notice: Percent of fee (100% = 100_000) that is taken in behalf of the governance from each sold shelter.

isGovernance(address).notice: Return true if given address is setup as governance in Controller

lastAuctionBidTs(uint256).notice: Timestamp (in seconds) of last created bid for the given position

nextAmount(uint256).notice: Min amount that is valid to be passed to {bid} for the given position. Initial amount is specified by seller in openPosition, than amount is increased with rate {NEXT_AMOUNT_RATIO} on creation of each new bid

openPosition(uint256,uint256).notice: Seller action. Open new position, setup min allowed auction price.

openPositionsLength().notice: Total number of currently opened positions

posByShelter(uint256).notice: Get position currently opened for the given shelter or 0

positionBidsLength(uint256).notice: Total number of currently opened bids for the given position

positionByBuyer(uint256).notice: Get info about bid opened by the given guild. Only one bid can be opened at any time.

positionBySeller(uint256).notice: Get position currently opened by the given guild. Only one position can be opened at any time.
